beer.name: Issaquah Frog Family: White Frog Ale
beer.description: "Aromas of coriander and orange spice dominate the nose. A very light mouthfeel is countered with sweet orange peel, coriander and subtle notes of chamomile. It finishes with delicate banana and clove spices. Surprisingly light and immediately quaffable."
beer.yeast: Flaked Oats, Flaked Rye, Coriander, Sweet Orange Peel, Nutmeg, Chamomile, Cinnamon, Ginger, Water and Belgian Witbier Yeast.
